title: Immortal Rider
description: In this dark, sexy romance from a New York Times bestselling author, a woman must make a deal with the actual devil to save her loverâ€”perfect for fans of Katee Robert, Laura Thalassa, and Scarlett St. Claire. Arik Wagner, a soldier with the U.S. Army's paranormal unit, the R-XR, kissed a girl and liked it. And then he went to hell as punishment. Where he's spent weeks being tortured...and plotting revenge.Limos, Horse woman of the Apocalypse, isn't your average girl. She's immortal, dangerous, and her fiance is Satan himself. In a moment of weakness, she gave in to her desire and kissed Arik, triggering her fiance's wrath - and his claim on her. In order to save Arik, and the world , Limos must make a dangerous pact with her recently turned evil brother, Pestilence. A deal that might just cost her her soul...and her heart.
author: Larissa Ione
